hint: Push down selective filters (date, category, marital status) early into CTEs and convert implicit joins to explicit JOINs for clarity and better plan choices.
Isolate dimension tables (date, customer, customer_demographics) into filtered CTEs, then join with fact tables using explicit JOIN syntax to reduce intermediate rows.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact subsets into separate CTEs, then restructure the self-join to compute aggregated pairs from a single store_sales scan.
Decompose the self-join by pre-aggregating store_sales, then join to items; use EXISTS for customer/dimension correlations and materialize intermediate results.
